caller_intent: Zach wants to transfer his RV insurance policy from Progressive to Alliance Insurance Services to consolidate policies under one agency and potentially secure an agency discount.
resolution_steps: Heather confirms Zach sent policy details on Friday but clarifies he did not receive an attachment.
Zach provides the Progressive policy number (2021 Cruiser) and renewal dates (Sept 6, 2025–2026).
Heather notes the policy is underwritten by Progressive Southeastern Insurance Company, not Alliance.
Zach agrees to take a photo of his paper policy documents and send them via text to Heather.
Heather explains the process of transferring the policy to Alliance would require a form and coordination with Progressive.
knowledge_required: Document submission workflows for policy rollovers
summary: Zach seeks to consolidate his RV insurance with Alliance Insurance by transferring his Progressive policy. Heather requires a paper copy of the policy documents to initiate the transfer process. The conversation outlines next steps for policy rollover and potential agency discounts.
